forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy this afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower late. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a shower late. Low near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. Thunder possible. High 62F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely. Low 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds light and variable.
